name: Dark Swords (itch)
description:
At the begining, there was only darkness, until the ancient spirits, became to give form to everythings: water, wind, earth, day and night , life and death . All were created from every single spirit, except fire. The fire was captured inside of Earth, hidden from all other things created. The fire spirit, can't create anything, because he was sentenced to be in the depths of the Earth, feeding all living forms.

After the years, all other spirits lose their power, and the fire spirit, plans to emerged from the bottom, and create the things what he wants, but, his destiny can't be changed. So, he used all his power, and the fire was created, beyond the confinement that bound him, live knew fire, a fire without a soul...
